pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Tidy Data Pipeline to Construct, Compare, and Analyse Indexes // Construct and analyse indexes in a pipeline tidy workflow. 'tidyindex' contains modules for transforming variables, aggregating variables across time, reducing data dimension through weighting, and fitting distributions. A manuscript describing the methodology can be found at https://github.com/huizezhang-sherry/paper-tidyindex.
